snippet.title: Rad Rodgers: Radical Edition Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
We're happy to announce Rad Rodgers: Radical Edition, coming for the Nintendo Switch! 

Some hugely popular new Heroes are joining the action, including Lo Wang from Shadow Warrior, Cosmo from Cosmo's Cosmic Adventure, and the one and only Duke Nukem from… Duke Nukem! And that’s just the start: the game’s also receiving a two-player co-op mode and a versus-multiplayer mode, alongside brand new levels and mini-games.

Best of all? The Radical Edition will be a FREE update for all current PC, Xbox One and PS4 owners!

Rad Rodgers Radical Edition will release on Nintendo Switch™ early 2019. Current owners of the game on PC, PlayStation®4 computer entertainment system and across the Xbox One family of devices including Xbox One X, will receive all the new Radical Edition.
